attributes.action: Call for parliament to disolve and call a general election.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: We, the public who vote and pay taxes must show the Mp's we are so angry about the latest events over expenses, that we insist Gordon Brown disolve parliament and hold a general election. We want to know that the people we vote this time are there for the people with the people.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
